meanings.definition: To cause to feel nausea or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The smell of rotten eggs nauseates me.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk nauseates my stomach.
meanings.sent3: The sight of the slimy snail nauseates the picky eater.
meanings.sent4: The idea of eating bugs nauseates her more than anything.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the bitter medicine nauseates him instantly.

meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride nauseates some people.
meanings.sent2: The strong smell nauseates her sensitive nose.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating a worm nauseates the adventurous eater.
meanings.sent4: The constant spinning nauseates her like a never-ending dance.
meanings.sent5: The gruesome scene in the movie nauseates the audience.
